bilingual.target: 他的作品广泛地被人们阅读。
这种观点广泛地被认同。
这种产品广泛地受到欢迎。

bilingual.source: Her research is widely applied in various fields.
bilingual.target: 她的研究成果广泛地应用于各个领域。

bilingual.source: The new technology is widely adopted in various industries.
bilingual.target: 新技术在各个行业中被广泛地采用。

bilingual.source: The artist's work is widely recognized for its unique style.
bilingual.target: 这位艺术家的作品因其独特的风格而被广泛地认可。

bilingual.source: The book is widely regarded as a classic in its field.
bilingual.target: 这本书在其领域中被广泛地认为是经典。

bilingual.source: The policy has been widely criticized for its lack of effectiveness.
bilingual.target: 这项政策因其缺乏效果而被广泛地批评。

bilingual.source: The movie was widely praised for its stunning visuals and compelling story.
bilingual.target: 这部电影因其惊人的视觉效果和引人入胜的故事而被广泛地赞誉。

list.abstract: widely（英 [ˈwaɪdli]，美 [ˈwaɪdli]），英语单词，作副词为广大地；范围广阔地；间隔很宽地。短语搭配有widely used（广泛用于）。例句为“Be widely criticized by online purchasers（受到网上买家的广泛批评）”。 widely相关近义词有diffusely。

yingyinNormal.en: While many proposals for higher level relationships -- or super families -- are speculative, some have been widely accepted and others are being considered, especially for native languages with small speaker populations that have not been extensively studied.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多人推测存在更高层面的关系也就是超级语系，一些说法已经被广泛认同，另一些还有争议，特别是对只有较少人使用的语言还没有全面研究。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Any writer needs to read as much and as <highlight>widely</highlight> as they can; it's the one indispensable supporter—something you can't do without.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何作家都需要尽可能大量且广泛地阅读，这是他们不可或缺的支柱。

examination_example.sentence: Though <highlight>widely</highlight> prevalent, the concept of dark patterns is still not well understood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管广泛流行，暗黑设计模式的概念仍然没有得到很好的理解。
受到网上买家的广泛批评。

examination_example.sentence: Look up Homo sapiens, and you will read: "Listed as Least Concern as the species is very <highlight>widely</highlight> distributed, adaptable, currently increasing. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查阅“智人”这一词条，你将会读到：“属于非危物种，因为该物种分布很广，适应性强，目前数量呈上升趋势。”

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 广泛用于；广泛使用；广泛采用

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Becoming too <highlight>widely</highlight> available at a cheaper price through discount stores discourages full-price sales.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过折扣店以更便宜的价格广泛销售会阻碍全价销售。

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>widely</highlight> used to identify people's individual traits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们被广泛用于识别人们的个人特征。

examination_example.sentence: Too much screen time is <highlight>widely</highlight> believed to be the cause of unhappiness among today's young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 荧屏时间过长被普遍认为是当今年轻人不快乐的原因。

examination_example.sentence: Fifteen years ago, Burberry was at crisis point as their signature check pattern was <highlight>widely</highlight> imitated by cheap, imitation brands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 15年前，巴宝莉(Burberry)正处于危机时刻，因为他们的签名支票模式被廉价的仿制品牌广泛模仿。

sense_info_list.en: by a large number of people

examination_example.sentence: The trend, then, was toward the "penny paper"-a term referring to papers made <highlight>widely</highlight> available to the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时的趋势是“便士报”——一个术语，指广泛向公众提供的报纸。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 广泛用于；广泛使用；广泛采用

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: As we all know, English is <highlight>widely</highlight> (广泛地) used all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如人们所知，英语在全世界范围内得到广泛使用。

examination_example.sentence: His greatest wish was to make the works more <highlight>widely</highlight> known and make much money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他最大的心愿就是让更多人知道这些作品，赚更多钱。

examination_example.sentence: Facial recognition technology (人脸识别技术) is <highlight>widely</highlight> used today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，人脸识别技术正得到广泛运用。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>widely</highlight> believed how Hot Dog had its name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个故事让大家普遍知道热狗名字的由来。

examination_example.sentence: A long time ago it was <highlight>widely</highlight> believed that there was life on Mars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很久以前，人们普遍认为火星上存在生命。

examination_example.sentence: A bit embarrassed, the woman smiled <highlight>widely</highlight> and thanked the officer for pointing out her misunderstanding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位女士有点尴尬，但她笑得很开心，并感谢警官指出了她的误解。
